name: Crawling Hunger
description:
This is a short demo for a 2D platformer in which you have to survive a beast that is chasing you. To survive you'll need to use the environment in your favor, blocking the monster and preventing it from eating you. 

A controller is required to play.

The art is inspired to Hollow Knight but it might change if I go on with the project, if you like this demo or have any feedback about it please write it in the comments, it will be really appreciated:)
